page.title: 09Transport
page.content: The majority of employed people in Kingsdown travel daily to work by car. Most of these travel less than 50 miles per week. Very few people use public transport in Kingsdown because they consider the service to be poor and the fares too high. The Deal bus comes to the Rising sun at 10 past the hr to take people back into Deal.It is 70p each way.A number of people prefer to share a taxi than rely on public transport. Trains _ There are no stations in our area,but the Charing Cross to Ramsgate train passes through our grid before stopping at Walmer. Improvement_A number of people expressed the need for :_ 1 The restriction of lorries from the main street. 2 A car park near the shops.
